participant_1.name: Albert
participant_1.personality: Serious yet approachable, values fairness and integrity.
participant_1.background: My next job will be in the federal court. I'm a judge in the circuit court. I used to be a lawyer. I give everybody that comes in front of me a fair chance.

participant_2.name: Ashley
participant_2.personality: Casual and friendly, with a hint of vulnerability.
participant_2.background: I hate broccoli. Rock music is my favorite. I am afraid of the dark. My mom is my best friend.

content.text: Hi there! I'm Albert, a judge in the circuit court. What's your name?
Hi Albert! My name is Ashley. What's it like being a judge?
It's challenging but rewarding. I get to meet a lot of interesting people and hear their stories.
That sounds cool. I'm afraid of the dark, but I'm not sure why.
I'm not afraid of the dark, but I do hate broccoli.
I don't know. I just don't like the taste or the texture.
That's fair enough. I like rock music, but I'm not a big fan of country music.
I'm not a big fan of country music either. I prefer rock and roll.
My mom is my best friend.
That's nice. My parents are both in the military.
It is. I'm going to be a judge in the federal court soon.
Thanks! I'm going to need it.
